47#ifndef AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
48#define AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
49
50#include "stdint.h"
51
52//
53// ARM standard register space (needed for macros)
54//
55#define REG_ITM_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
56#define REG_JEDEC_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
57#define REG_NVIC_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
58#define REG_SYSCTRL_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
59#define REG_SYSTICK_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
60#define REG_TPIU_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
61
62//
63// Peripheral register space
64//
65#define REG_ADC_BASEADDR (0x50010000UL)
66#define REG_APBDMA_BASEADDR (0x40011000UL)
67#define REG_BLEIF_BASEADDR (0x5000C000UL)
68#define REG_CACHECTRL_BASEADDR (0x40018000UL)
69#define REG_CLKGEN_BASEADDR (0x40004000UL)
70#define REG_CTIMER_BASEADDR (0x40008000UL)
71#define REG_GPIO_BASEADDR (0x40010000UL)
72//#define REG_IOMSTR_BASEADDR (0x50004000UL)
73#define REG_IOM_BASEADDR (0x50004000UL)
74#define REG_IOSLAVE_BASEADDR (0x50000000UL)
75#define REG_MCUCTRL_BASEADDR (0x40020000UL)
76#define REG_MSPI_BASEADDR (0x50014000UL)
77#define REG_PDM_BASEADDR (0x50011000UL)
78#define REG_PWRCTRL_BASEADDR (0x40021000UL)
79#define REG_RSTGEN_BASEADDR (0x40000000UL)
80#define REG_RTC_BASEADDR (0x40004200UL)
81#define REG_SCARD_BASEADDR (0x40080000UL)
82#define REG_SECURITY_BASEADDR (0x40030000UL)
83#define REG_UART_BASEADDR (0x4001C000UL)
84#define REG_VCOMP_BASEADDR (0x4000C000UL)
85#define REG_WDT_BASEADDR (0x40024000UL)
86
87//
88// SRAM address space
89//
90#define SRAM_BASEADDR (0x10000000UL)
91
92//
93// Flash address space
94//
95#define FLASH_BASEADDR (0x00000000UL)
96
97#endif // AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
